reviewText:
I take this DVD with me when I travel. It's a great option to have when I can't make it to a class.
The instructor is excellent and provides very detailed instruction on the poses.

This DVD is Awesome! You can tell this was put together by a knowledgable yoga teacher who does her fair share of riding. Including a pre and post ride routine this shortens recovery time and aids in injury prevention.  I love the beach routine!
